price: ម្ចាស់របស់អ្នកមហាស្អាតស្អំ ជាម្ចាស់មហាខ្ពង់ខ្ពស់អំពី អ្វីដែលពួកគេនិយាយប្រឌិត។
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلۡعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbika rabbi al-ʿizati ʿammā yaṣifūna
